name: Free Juicers
description:
Control with the arrow keys!

                                                                                                                                                                                               

Free Juicers is a casual arcade/puzzle game about robbing fruit of their juices.

Slide the protagonist across the game board, collect fruit - and all adjacent matching fruit - by colliding with them.

Drink as many fruit as you can each turn, if you don't collect fruit fast enough the board will fill up and you will lose health.

The game is here as a (slightly) unfinished prototype. Most of the game is complete, but I haven't found the time to polish the menus & add a tutorial yet.
